## Events

| Event            | Description | Type                                                |
| ---------------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| `paymentFailed`  |             | `CustomEvent<{ error: PlugPaymentsChargeError; }>`  |
| `paymentSuccess` |             | `CustomEvent<{ data: PlugPaymentsChargeSuccess; }>` |
